duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and lead implementation for staffing plans, policies, and procedures for the facility.
Work closely with clinicians to ensure optimal patient outcomes.
Conduct briefings and area meetings; maintain frequent contact with other managers across the department.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.
